text: "Bark at the Moon" is a 1983 song by English heavy metal singer Ozzy Osbourne. It is the first single from the 1983 album of the same name. It went to number 21 in the United Kingdom and is frequently being voted one of Ozzy's best music videos. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Heavy metal Category:Ozzy Osbourne songs
title: Bark at the Moon (song)
